Hi,

I'm Théotime

I'm a French Dauphine Student from Bordeaux and currently living in Paris.
I've started to learn Web development on my own since I'm 17 years old.
I've done Le Wagon in 2019 and I'm really interested in Creative and Frontend development.
When I'm not coding I enjoy playing sports especially soccer.
Also I like playing piano, drink beers with my friends, discover new
cities, countries and, foremost, foreign culture.
